# **Order Status Summary**

**Difficulty:** Medium  •  **Tags:** `CASE` • `GROUP BY` • `COUNT`



## **Problem Description**

Count orders by status (pending, completed, cancelled).



## **Table Schema**

**orders**
```
+--------+------+
| Column | Type |
+--------+------+
| id     | INT  |
| status | TEXT |
+--------+------+
```



## **Example**

### **Input**

**orders**
```
+----+-----------+
| id | status    |
+----+-----------+
| 1  | pending   |
| 2  | completed |
| 3  | pending   |
| 4  | cancelled |
| 5  | completed |
| 6  | completed |
+----+-----------+
```

### **Expected Output**

```
+-----------+-------+
| status    | count |
+-----------+-------+
| cancelled | 1     |
| completed | 3     |
| pending   | 2     |
+-----------+-------+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE orders(id INT, status TEXT); INSERT INTO orders VALUES (1,'pending'),(2,'completed'),(3,'pending'),(4,'cancelled'),(5,'completed'),(6,'completed');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM orders GROUP BY status;
